Package distibuted

Class ClientEndPoint

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
distibuted.ClientEndPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, Serializable, Remote, CommonGoalView, GameView, LivingRoomView, PersonalGoalView, PlayerChatView, PlayerView, ShelfView, UserView, ViewCollection
public class ClientEndPoint extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ClientInterface
This class is an implementation of ClientInterface and represents the client endpoint for socket and RMI connections
See Also:

      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of an error occurred exporting this remote object

    • bind

      public void bind(ServerInterface server) throws RemoteException
      This method binds a client to a server

      Starts a Thread that receives pings and calls disconnectionCallback if it stops receiving them

      Specified by:
      bind in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      server - a ServerInterface that represents the server the client will bind with
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the binding fails
